text: Gamba nti bakadde ba mmwe n’abaana ba mmwe, ne baganda ba mmwe, ne bemwafumbiriganwa nabo, n’aboluganda lwa mmwe, n’ebyobugagga bye mukungaanya, n’ebyobusuubuzi bye mutya okudiba kwabyo, n’amayumba agabasanyusa, ebyo byonna bwe biba nga bye mwagala e nnyo okusinga Katonda n’omubakawe, n’okulafuubana okuweereza mu kkubolye, olwo nno mulindirire okutuusa Katonda lwanaaleeta e kiragirokye, era Katonda talungamya bantu boonoonyi
